sentences.en: Scented leaves like lavender, mint or thyme.
sentences.cn: 有香味的叶子：薰衣草、薄荷和百里香。

sentences.en: When I met her she was in the fields harvesting thyme.
sentences.cn: 当我遇到她时，她正在田里丰收百里香。

sentences.en: Then throw in the garlic and scallions and sprinkle the thyme over the chicken.
sentences.cn: 然后放入蒜和葱，并在鸡块上撒上百里香。
